selectLetters.title: Select Letters:
selectLetters.description: Tap the buttons around the wheel to form a word. The wheel contains a mix of:
selectLetters.vowels: Vowels: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Long vowels with diacritics: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Letters may appear more than once across different words but are shown only once in the wheel.

formingWords.title: Forming Words:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Words in the puzzle must be spelled correctly in the target language, using proper diacritics when required.
formingWords.availableLetters: All letters in the word must come from the seven on the wheel.
formingWords.minLength: Each word must be at least 3 letters long.

submitAuto.title: Submit Automatically:
submitAuto.autoAppear: When you complete a valid word, it will automatically appear in the crossword-style grid above the wheel.
submitAuto.noSubmit: No need to press a "submit" button.

editing.title: Editing:
editing.mistake: Made a mistake? Tap the center delete button to remove the last letter you selected.
editing.keepTapping: Keep tapping delete to remove letters one by one.

continue.title: Continue Guessing:
continue.afterSuccess: After a successful word, keep going to find more.
continue.findAll: Try to discover all the words hidden in the puzzle!

tips.title: Tips
tips.diacriticals: Don't forget to use diacritics where needed—they count as distinct characters.
tips.differences: Many Polynesian words differ only by the use of diacritics. Be careful with proper spelling.
tips.example: For example, these are all different words: pau, paʻu, paʻū, and pāʻū.
tips.pronunciation: Listen closely to how words are pronounced—they often hint at correct spelling.

confirmRefresh.title: Start New Game?
confirmRefresh.message: This will reset your current progress and start a new puzzle.

messages.threeLetterHint: Try typing more letters for longer words!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: If you type any word that is shorter than the maximum word length, wait three seconds and I will automatically determine if it is correct. Otherwise, click on the enter key to the right of where your word appears.

uploader.title: Upload Custom Word List
uploader.description: Upload a text file with words (one per line) to create a custom puzzle.
uploader.dragDrop: Drag and drop a .txt file here, or click to select
uploader.error: Error loading file. Please try again.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Thank you to all contributors for the word lists used in this game.

selectLetters.title: Koho Huapalapala:
selectLetters.description: Koho i nā pihi i loko o ka huila e kākau ai i kekahi huaʻōlelo. Aia i loko o ka huila 'ehiku huapalapala i 'ike 'ia i loko o nā hua'ōlelo:
selectLetters.vowels: Nā hua Hawaiʻi: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Nā hua me ka kahakō: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Hiki i nā leka ke hōʻike ʻia ma nā huaʻōlelo he nui, akā e hōʻike ʻia hoʻokahi wale nō manawa i loko o ka huila.

formingWords.title: Ke Haku Huaʻōlelo:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Pono e kākau pololei ʻia nā huaʻōlelo 'ōlelo Hawai'i i hūnā 'ia i loko o ka nane hua'ōlelo.
formingWords.availableLetters: Aia i loko o ka huila nā huapalapala a pau i loa'a i loko o nā hua'ōlelo.
formingWords.minLength: Pono e lōʻihi ka huaʻōlelo i nā leka ʻekolu a ʻoi aku paha.

submitAuto.title: Hoʻouna ʻAkomi:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Ke pau ka huaʻōlelo kūpono, e pāʻia ʻakomi ia ma loko o ka papa huaʻōlelo ma luna o ka huila.
submitAuto.noSubmit: ʻAʻole pono e kaomi i ka pihi "hoʻouna".

editing.title: Hoʻoponopono:
editing.mistake: Ua kiko hewa 'oe? E kaomi i ke pihi holoi i waena o nā huapalapala e wehe ai i ka huapalapala hope loa āu i koho ai.
editing.keepTapping: Paʻi mau i ka holoi e wehe mau i nā leka hoʻokahi i ka manawa.

continue.title: E Hoʻomau i ka Nānā ʻana:
continue.afterSuccess: Ma hope o ka loaʻa ʻana o kekahi huaʻōlelo kūpono, e hoʻomau e ʻimi i nā mea hou aku.
continue.findAll: E hoʻāʻo e ʻike i nā huaʻōlelo a pau i hūnā ʻia i loko o ka pakuhi!

tips.title: Nā Manaʻo Kōkua
tips.diacriticals: Mai poina e hoʻohana i ka kahakō (macron) a me ka ʻokina i nā wahi kūpono—he mau leka kūʻokoʻa nō lāua.
tips.differences: E makaʻala: Nui nā huaʻōlelo Hawaiʻi e koe wale nō ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka ʻokina a i ʻole ka kahakō.
tips.example: He laʻana: ʻokoʻa kēia mau huaʻōlelo: pau, paʻu, paʻū, a me pāʻū.
tips.pronunciation: E hoʻolohe pono i ka puana ʻana o nā huaʻōlelo Hawaiʻi—he kōkua ka lohe pono ana i ke kikokiko 'ana i ka hua'ōlelo pololei.

confirmRefresh.title: Hoʻomaka i pāʻani hou?
confirmRefresh.message: E holoi ʻia kāu holomua a hoʻomaka kekahi nane hou.

messages.invalidWord: ʻAʻole ia he huaʻōlelo i loa'a
messages.threeLetterHint: E kaomi hou i pihi i huli 'ia no nā huaʻōlelo lōʻihi!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Inā kākau ʻoe i kekahi huaʻōlelo pōkole ma mua o ka lōʻihi loa, e kali ʻekolu mau kekona a e ʻike au iā ia. A inā ʻaʻole, e kaomi i ka pihi hoʻokomo ma ka ʻākau o kāu huaʻōlelo.

uploader.title: Hoʻouka Papa Huaʻōlelo Hou
uploader.description: Hoʻouka i kekahi faila kikokikona me nā huaʻōlelo Hawaiʻi (hoʻokahi ma kēlā me kēia laina) e hana ai i pakuhi kūikawā.
uploader.dragDrop: Kaualakō i ka waihona .txt ma ʻaneʻi, a ho'oku'u, a i 'ole kaomi e koho
uploader.error: Hewa i ka hoʻouka faila. E hoʻāʻo hou.
uploader.startGame: Hoʻomaka i ka Pāʻani me nā Huaʻōlelo Kūikawā

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Mahalo nui iā Mary Boyce nāna ka papa hua'ōlelo e ho'ohana 'ia i kēia nane.

selectLetters.title: Kōwhiri Reta:
selectLetters.description: Pāwhiria ngā pātene huri noa i te huringa hei waihanga i tētahi kupu. Kei roto i te huringa:
selectLetters.vowels: Ngā oropuare Māori: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Ngā oropuare roa me te tohutō: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Ka kitea ngā reta he maha hoki, engari, kotahi anake te whakaaturanga i te huringa.

formingWords.title: Te Waihanga Kupu:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Me tika te takitaki o ngā kupu i roto i te reo Māori, me whakamahi hoki i te tohutō me i nga wā tika.
formingWords.availableLetters: Me riro katoa ngā reta o te kupu mai i ngā reta e whitu kei roto i te huringa.
formingWords.minLength: Kia toru te roa iti o ngā reta.

submitAuto.title: Tuku Aunoa:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Ka oti ana tētahi kupu tika, ka kitea aunoatia i te pangakupu i runga i te huringa.

editing.title: Whakatikatika:
editing.mistake: I hē koe? Pāwhiritia te pātene mukua i waenganui i te huringa hei tangohia tāu reta mutunga i kōwhiriti ai.
editing.keepTapping: Me pāwhiri tonu i te pātene "tuku" kia tangohia ngā reta tētahi i muri i tētahi.

continue.title: Haere Tonu:
continue.afterSuccess: Ki te kitea tētahi kupu tiki, haere tonu ki te kimi atu.
continue.findAll: Me ngana koe ki te kite i ngā kupu katoa kua huna ki te panga kupu!

tips.title: Tohutohu
tips.diacriticals: Kaua e wareware ki te whakamahi i te tohutō i ngā wā e tika ai—he reta rerekē ēnei.
tips.differences: He maha ngā kupu Māori i rerekē nā te whakamahia o te tohutō. Kia tūpato:
tips.example: Hei tauira, he kupu rerekē katoa ēnei: keke, kēkē, kekē.
tips.pronunciation: Whakarongo ki te whakahua o ngā kupu Māori—he tohu ēnei mō te tātaki kupu tika.

confirmRefresh.title: Tīmata Kēmu Hōu?
confirmRefresh.message: Mā tēnei koe ka whakatūngia tō whakaahu whakamua, ā, ka tīmata hōu ai he kēmu.

messages.letterNotAvailable: Kāore te reta nei i roto i tētahi kupu
messages.threeLetterHint: Me ngana ki te kimi i ngā reta mō ngā kupu roa atu!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Mēnā ka taiapa koe i tētahi kupu he poto iho i te mutunga roa, tatari ai kia toru hēkona, ā maku e whakatau ai mēnā he tika. Mēnā rānei, pāwhiri i te kī urunga ki te katau o tō kupu.

uploader.title: Tikiake Kōnae Kupu Motuhake
uploader.description: Tikiake he kōnae kupu Māori (kotahi kupu i ia raina) hei hanga panga kupu motuhake.
uploader.dragDrop: Tōia, whakangā hoki he kōnae .txt ki konei, pāwhiri rānei ki te pātene kōwhiri
uploader.error: I raruraru te uta kōnae. Me tikiake anō.
uploader.startGame: Tīmata i te kēmu ki ngā kupu motuhake

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Ngā mihi ki a Mary Boyce nāna ka rārangi kupu e whakamahia i tēnei tanga kupu.

mao.loading: E tukuatu ana ngā kupu Māori...

selectLetters.title: Hiri i te mau Pi'i:
selectLetters.description: Tāpā i te mau pi'i i ni'a i te rō'a no te hāpono i te ta'ata parau. Te mau pi'i i roto i te rō'a:
selectLetters.vowels: Te mau orofena Tahiti: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Te mau orofena roa me te tārava: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Te mau pi'i e nehenehe ia hōpe'a mai i te mau ta'ata parau 'ē, 'e ite ra'a hoê 'avae i te rō'a.

formingWords.title: Te Hāpono i te mau Ta'ata Parau:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Ia fa'atei te mau ta'ata parau i roto i te reo Tahiti, me te fa'aohipa 'ana i te 'eta e i te tārava i te mau taime fa'aea.
formingWords.availableLetters: Te mau pi'i tōtaha o te ta'ata parau mai te mau pi'i hitu i ni'a i te rō'a.
formingWords.minLength: Ia roa te ta'ata parau i te toru pi'i.

submitAuto.title: Fa'aora Otomāti:
submitAuto.autoAppear: I te pau 'ana o te ta'ata parau fa'aea, e ite mau otomāti i ni'a i te rō'a.
submitAuto.noSubmit: Aita ta pi'i "fa'aora" e tāpā ai.

editing.title: Fa'anahora'a:
editing.mistake: Ua hape? Tāpā i te pi'i faakore i te pu i waena o te rō'a no te 'ā'ai 'ana i tāu pi'i hope roa i hiri ai 'oe.
editing.keepTapping: Tāpā mau i te faakore no te 'ā'ai mau 'ana i te mau pi'i ta'atahi i te taime.

continue.title: Fa'ahou:
continue.afterSuccess: I muri i te loaa'a 'ana o te ta'ata parau fa'aea, fa'ahou e 'imi i te mau mea 'ē atu.
continue.findAll: Tē mea ra ia 'ite i te mau ta'ata parau tōtaha ua huna 'ia i roto i te ta'iri parau!

tips.title: Te mau Faufa'a
tips.diacriticals: Aua e pohe te fa'aohipa 'ana i te tārava e i te 'eta i te mau taime fa'aea—he pi'i 'ē rāua.
tips.differences: Te mau ta'ata parau Tahiti mau e 'ē noa i te fa'aohipa 'ana i te tārava e i te 'eta. Ia fa'atia:
tips.example: Te laana nei, he ta'ata parau 'ē tōtaha: pau, pa'u, pa'ū, e pā'ū.
tips.pronunciation: Fa'aroho maitai i te pehe 'ana o te mau ta'ata parau Tahiti—he tauturu mau i te fa'atei tika 'ana.

game.showWords: Fa'aite i te mau Ta'ata Parau
game.hideWords: Huna i te mau Ta'ata Parau

confirmRefresh.title: Fa'atō i te ta'iri api?
confirmRefresh.message: E fa'atei teie i tāu hōrue e fa'atō ai i te ta'iri api.

messages.invalidWord: Aita teie he ta'ata parau tika
messages.letterNotAvailable: Aita te pi'i nei i loa'a
messages.threeLetterHint: Tē mea nei ia 'imi i te mau pi'i no te mau ta'ata parau roa atu!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Inaha fa'atei 'oe i te ta'ata parau poto iho i te roa mau, tatari ia toru hēkona, ā naku e fa'aho'i mēnā he tika. A inaha aita, tāpā i te pi'i 'uru i te 'ataʻu o tāu ta'ata parau.

uploader.title: Fa'aora Papa Ta'ata Parau Motuhake
uploader.description: Fa'aora i te faira ta'ata me te mau ta'ata parau Tahiti (hoê ma te reira raina) no te hāpono i te ta'iri motuhake.
uploader.dragDrop: Tōhia e fa'aea hoki te faira .txt i 'ō nei, tāpā rānei no te hiri
uploader.error: Hape i te fa'aora faira. Ia 'ā'ano hou.
uploader.useDefault: Fa'aohipa i te mau Ta'ata Parau Pau'amau
uploader.startGame: Fa'atō i te Ta'iri me te mau Ta'ata Parau Motuhake

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Māuruuru i te mau tauturu no te papa ta'ata parau e fa'aohipa nei i teie ta'iri.

tah.loading: Tē fa'aora nei te mau ta'ata parau Tahiti...

selectLetters.title: Sélectionner les Lettres:
selectLetters.description: Appuyez sur les boutons autour de la roue pour former un mot. La roue contient un mélange de:
selectLetters.vowels: Voyelles: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Voyelles longues avec diacritiques: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Les lettres peuvent apparaître plusieurs fois dans différents mots mais ne sont affichées qu'une seule fois dans la roue.

formingWords.title: Formation des Mots:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Les mots du puzzle doivent être épelés correctement dans la langue cible, en utilisant les diacritiques appropriés lorsque requis.
formingWords.availableLetters: Toutes les lettres du mot doivent provenir des sept sur la roue.
formingWords.minLength: Chaque mot doit comporter au moins 3 lettres.

submitAuto.title: Soumission Automatique:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Lorsque vous complétez un mot valide, il apparaîtra automatiquement dans la grille style mots croisés au-dessus de la roue.
submitAuto.noSubmit: Pas besoin d'appuyer sur un bouton "soumettre".

editing.title: Modification:
editing.mistake: Une erreur? Appuyez sur le bouton supprimer au centre pour retirer la dernière lettre sélectionnée.
editing.keepTapping: Continuez à appuyer sur supprimer pour retirer les lettres une par une.

continue.title: Continuer à Deviner:
continue.afterSuccess: Après un mot réussi, continuez pour en trouver d'autres.
continue.findAll: Essayez de découvrir tous les mots cachés dans le puzzle!

tips.title: Conseils
tips.diacriticals: N'oubliez pas d'utiliser les diacritiques là où nécessaire—ils comptent comme des caractères distincts.
tips.differences: Beaucoup de mots polynésiens ne diffèrent que par l'utilisation de diacritiques. Attention à l'orthographe correcte.
tips.example: Par exemple, ce sont tous des mots différents: pau, paʻu, paʻū, et pāʻū.
tips.pronunciation: Écoutez attentivement la prononciation des mots—elle donne souvent des indices sur l'orthographe correcte.

confirmRefresh.title: Commencer Nouveau Jeu?
confirmRefresh.message: Ceci réinitialisera votre progression actuelle et démarrera un nouveau puzzle.

messages.threeLetterHint: Essayez de taper plus de lettres pour des mots plus longs!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Si vous tapez un mot plus court que la longueur maximale, attendez trois secondes et je déterminerai automatiquement s'il est correct. Sinon, cliquez sur la touche entrée à droite de votre mot.

uploader.title: Télécharger Liste de Mots Personnalisée
uploader.description: Téléchargez un fichier texte avec des mots (un par ligne) pour créer un puzzle personnalisé.
uploader.dragDrop: Glissez-déposez un fichier .txt ici, ou cliquez pour sélectionner
uploader.error: Erreur de chargement du fichier. Veuillez réessayer.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Merci à tous les contributeurs pour les listes de mots utilisées dans ce jeu.

selectLetters.title: Seleccionar Letras:
selectLetters.description: Toca los botones alrededor de la rueda para formar una palabra. La rueda contiene una mezcla de:
selectLetters.vowels: Vocales: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Vocales largas con diacríticos: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Las letras pueden aparecer más de una vez en diferentes palabras pero se muestran solo una vez en la rueda.

formingWords.title: Formando Palabras:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Las palabras en el rompecabezas deben estar deletreadas correctamente en el idioma objetivo, usando diacríticos apropiados cuando sea requerido.
formingWords.availableLetters: Todas las letras de la palabra deben provenir de las siete en la rueda.
formingWords.minLength: Cada palabra debe tener al menos 3 letras.

submitAuto.title: Enviar Automáticamente:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Cuando completes una palabra válida, aparecerá automáticamente en la cuadrícula estilo crucigrama arriba de la rueda.

editing.title: Editando:
editing.mistake: ¿Cometiste un error? Toca el botón borrar del centro para quitar la última letra que seleccionaste.
editing.keepTapping: Sigue tocando borrar para quitar letras una por una.

continue.title: Continuar Adivinando:
continue.afterSuccess: Después de una palabra exitosa, sigue para encontrar más.
continue.findAll: ¡Trata de descubrir todas las palabras escondidas en el rompecabezas!

tips.title: Consejos
tips.diacriticals: No olvides usar diacríticos donde sea necesario—cuentan como caracteres distintos.
tips.differences: Muchas palabras polinesias difieren solo por el uso de diacríticos. Ten cuidado con la ortografía correcta.
tips.example: Por ejemplo, todas estas son palabras diferentes: pau, paʻu, paʻū, y pāʻū.
tips.pronunciation: Escucha atentamente cómo se pronuncian las palabras—a menudo dan pistas sobre la ortografía correcta.

confirmRefresh.title: ¿Comenzar Juego Nuevo?
confirmRefresh.message: Esto reiniciará tu progreso actual y comenzará un nuevo rompecabezas.

messages.threeLetterHint: ¡Trata de escribir más letras para palabras más largas!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Si escribes una palabra más corta que la longitud máxima, espera tres segundos y automáticamente determinaré si es correcta. De lo contrario, haz clic en la tecla enter a la derecha de donde aparece tu palabra.

uploader.title: Subir Lista de Palabras Personalizada
uploader.description: Sube un archivo de texto con palabras (una por línea) para crear un rompecabezas personalizado.
uploader.dragDrop: Arrastra y suelta un archivo .txt aquí, o haz clic para seleccionar
uploader.error: Error cargando archivo. Por favor intenta otra vez.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Gracias a todos los contribuyentes por las listas de palabras usadas en este juego.

selectLetters.title: Filifili Mata:
selectLetters.description: Oomi i kilīniki o le li'o e faia ai se upu. O lo'o i ai i le li'o:
selectLetters.vowels: Mata Samoa: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Mata uumi ma fa'ailogaga: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: E mafai ona fa'aalia mata i le tele o taimi ae na'o le tasi le fa'aaliga i le li'o.

formingWords.title: Faia Upu:
formingWords.correctSpelling: E tatau ona tusitusi sa'o upu o le mea'ai i le gagana fa'atatau, fa'aaoga ai fa'ailoga sa'o pe a mana'omia.
formingWords.availableLetters: O mata uma o le upu e tatau ona sau mai mata e fitu i le li'o.
formingWords.minLength: E tatau ona i ai le tolu mata i upu ta'itasi.

submitAuto.title: Lafo Otometi:
submitAuto.autoAppear: A mae'a se upu talafeagai, o le a fa'aalia otometi i le fa'atonuga e pei o upu fa'alava i luga o le li'o.
submitAuto.noSubmit: E leai se mana'oga e oomi ai se ki "lafo".

editing.title: Fa'asa:
editing.mistake: Na faia se mea sese? Oomi le ki tape i le ogatotonu e aveese ai lau mata mulimuli na e filifilia.
editing.keepTapping: Fa'aauau ona oomi le tape e aveese ai mata ta'itasi i taimi.

continue.title: Fa'aauau le Mate:
continue.afterSuccess: A uma se upu manuia, fa'aauau e su'e isi.
continue.findAll: Taumafai e maua upu uma ua natia i le mea'ai!

tips.title: Fautuaga
tips.diacriticals: Aua ne'i galo ia te oe ona fa'aaoga fa'ailoga pe a mana'omia—o mata eseese ia.
tips.differences: O le tele o upu Polenisia e eseese ai na'o le fa'aogaina o fa'ailoga. Ia fa'aeteete i le tusitusiga sa'o.
tips.example: Mo se fa'ata'ita'iga, o nei uma o upu eseese: pau, paʻu, paʻū, ma pāʻū.
tips.pronunciation: Fa'alogo lelei i le tautala o upu—e masani ona tu'uina atu fautuaga mo le tusitusiga sa'o.

confirmRefresh.title: Amata Ta'aloga Fou?
confirmRefresh.message: O le a toe seti ai lau alualu ma amata ai se mea'ai fou.

messages.wordFoundDesc: Ua e maua ma le manuia {{word}}!
messages.invalidWord: E le o se upu talafeagai
messages.threeLetterHint: Taumafai e tusi atu mata mo upu uumi!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Afai e te tusia se upu e puupuu ifo i le umi sili, faatali tolu sekone ma ou te otometi ai ona iloa pe sa'o. A leai foi, kiliki le ki ulufale i le taumatau o le mea e aliali ai lau upu.

uploader.title: Fa'aulu Lisi Upu Fa'apitoa
uploader.description: Fa'aulu se faila tusitusia ma upu (tasi i laina ta'itasi) e faia ai se mea'ai fa'apitoa.
uploader.dragDrop: Toso ma tuu se faila .txt iinei, pe kiliki e filifili
uploader.success: {{count}} upu na fa'aulu ma le manuia!
uploader.error: Fa'afitauli i le fa'aulu faila. Fa'amolemole toe taumafai.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Fa'afetai i tagata uma na fesoasoani mo lisi upu na fa'aaogaina i lenei ta'aloga.

selectLetters.title: Fili 'a e ngaahi Lēta:
selectLetters.description: Tapo 'a e ngaahi patani 'o takatakai 'a e vili ko e ngahiʻanga 'o ha lea. 'Oku 'i he vili:
selectLetters.vowels: Ngaahi lēta siʻo: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Ngaahi lēta siʻo tolonga mo e ngaahi fakamatala: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: 'E lava 'a e ngaahi lēta ke ha'u 'i he ngaahi lea kehekehe ka ko e taha pe 'ene fakahā 'i he vili.

formingWords.title: Ngaohi 'a e ngaahi Lea:
formingWords.correctSpelling: 'Oku pau ke tohi totonu 'a e ngaahi lea 'o e founga 'i he lea fakatokanga'i, mo e ngaue'aki 'a e ngaahi fakamatala totonu 'i he taimi fiema'u.
formingWords.availableLetters: Ko e ngaahi lēta kotoa 'o e lea 'oku pau ke ha'u mei he lēta fitu 'i he vili.
formingWords.minLength: 'Oku pau ke 'i ai ha lēta 'e tolu 'i ha lea kotoa.

submitAuto.title: Fekau 'Otomēteki:
submitAuto.autoAppear: 'I he ka ke 'osi ha lea lelei, 'e ha'u 'otomēteki ia 'i he fale'anga fekauaki mo e ngaahi lea hūfaki 'i 'olunga 'i he vili.
submitAuto.noSubmit: 'Ikai ha fiema'u ke tapo ha patani "fekau".

editing.title: Fakalelei:
editing.mistake: Na'e fai ha hala? Tapo 'a e patani 'atu 'i he potu lotoloto ke 'ave 'a ho lēta mui taha na'e ke fili.
editing.keepTapping: Tumaki pe ke tapo 'a e 'atu ke 'ave 'a e ngaahi lēta taha taha.

continue.title: Tumaki 'a e Mahino:
continue.afterSuccess: Hili ha lea ikuna, tumaki ke kumi ha me'a kehe.
continue.findAll: Feinga'i ke 'ilo 'a e ngaahi lea kotoa kuo fufū 'i he fakatau!

tips.title: ngaahi Ako
tips.diacriticals: 'Oua te ke ngalo ke ngaue'aki 'a e ngaahi fakamatala 'i he fiema'u—ko ngaahi lēta kehekehe ia.
tips.differences: 'Oku lahi 'a e ngaahi lea Polinēsia 'oku kehekehe ai pe 'i he ngaue'aki 'a e ngaahi fakamatala. Tokanga'i 'a e tohi totonu.
tips.example: Ko e fakamatala ni, ko e ngaahi lea kehekehe kotoa eni: pau, paʻu, paʻū, mo pāʻū.
tips.pronunciation: Fanongo lelei ki he lea 'o e ngaahi lea—'oku nau 'ilo'i ma'u pe 'a e tohi totonu.

confirmRefresh.title: Kamata ha Fakatau Fo'ou?
confirmRefresh.message: 'E fakafo'ou eni ho hāfoki 'o e taimi ni mo kamata ha fakatau fo'ou.

messages.threeLetterHint: Feinga'i ke tohi lēta lahi ange ki he ngaahi lea lōloa!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: Kapau te ke tohi ha lea 'oku poto iho 'i he lōloa mākehe, 'alo 'a e sekoni 'e tolu pea te u 'ilo 'otomēteki pe kapau 'oku totonu. Ka 'ikai, lomihi 'a e ki 'ulu 'i he toumataʻu 'o e feitu'u 'oku hā ai ho lea.

uploader.title: Hiki Hake Lisi Lea Fakatonutonu
uploader.description: Hiki hake ha faile tohi mo e ngaahi lea (taha 'i ha laina) ke ngaohi ha fakatau fakatonutonu.
uploader.dragDrop: Toho mo tuku ha faile .txt ki heni, pe lomihi ke fili
uploader.error: Hala 'i he hiki hake faile. 'Oku 'auhola ke toe feinga'i.
uploader.startGame: Kamata Fakatau mo e Ngaahi Lea Fakatonutonu

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Malo 'a e tokoni kotoa ki he ngaahi lisi lea na'e ngaue'aki 'i he fakatau ni.
